XXbsu035_u:355: anekakalpāni tu cintayante na śakya paryantaguṇāni jñātum // Suv_4.67 //
XXbsu035_u:356: mahī saśailā sagiriḥ sasāgarā gaṇaṃ tu kalpairapi śakya jānitum /
XXbsu035_u:357: jalaṃ ca vālāgramapi pramāṇaṃ na śakya buddhasya guṇāgrapāram // Suv_4.68
XXbsu035_u:358: etādṛśī sattva bhavantu sarve guṇena varṇena yaśena koṭyā /
XXbsu035_u:360: anena cāhaṃ kuśalena karmaṇā bhaveya buddho na cireṇa loke /
XXbsu035_u:361: deśeya dharmaṃ jagato hitāya moceya sattvānbahuduḥkhapīḍitān // Suv_4.70
XXbsu035_u:362: jayeya māraṃ sabalaṃ sasainyaṃ pravartayeyaṃ śubhadharmacakram /
XXbsu035_u:363: tiṣṭheya kalpāni acintiyāni tarpeya sattvānamṛtena pāṇinā // Suv_4.71 //
XXbsu035_u:364: pūreya ṣaṭpāramitā anuttarā yathaiva pūrvaṃ jinapūrvakānām /
XXbsu035_u:365: haneya kleśānvidhameya duḥkhān śameya rāgāṃstatha dveṣamohān // Suv_4.72
XXbsu035_u:366: jātismaro nitya bhaveya cāhaṃ jātiśatā jātisahasrakoṭyaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:367: anusmareyaṃ satataṃ munīndraṃ śṛṇvīya teṣāṃ vacanaṃ hyudāram // Suv_4.73
XXbsu035_u:369: anena cāhaṃ kuśalena karmaṇā labheya buddhehi sadā samāgamam /
XXbsu035_u:370: vivarjayeyaṃ khalu pāpakarma careya puṇyāni śubhākarāṇi // Suv_4.74 //
XXbsu035_u:371: sarvatra kṣetreṣu ca sarvaprāṇināṃ sarve ca pāpāḥ praśamantu loke /
XXbsu035_u:372: ye sattvā vikalendriya aṅgahīnāḥ te sarvi kuśalendriya bhontu sāṃpratam //
XXbsu035_u:374: te sarvi mucyantu ca vyādhito laghu labhantu cārogyabalendriyāni //
XXbsu035_u:376: te sarvi sattvā vyasanāgataduḥkhitā hi mucyantu te bhayaśataiḥ paramaiḥ sughoraiḥ // Suv_4.77
XXbsu035_u:377: ye pīḍitā bandhanabaddhapīḍitā vividheṣu vyasaneṣu saṃsthitā hi /
XXbsu035_u:379: te sarve mucyantu ca bandhanebhyaḥ saṃtāḍitā mucyantu ca tāḍanebhyaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:380: vadhyāśca mucyantu jīvitebhyo vyasanāgatā nirbhayā bhontu sarve //
XXbsu035_u:381: ye sattva kṣuttarṣanipīḍitāśca labhantu te bhojanapānacitram /
XXbsu035_u:383: andhāśca paśyantu vicitrarūpān vadhirāśca śṛṇvantu manojñaghoṣān //
XXbsu035_u:384: nagnāśca vastrāṇi labhantu citrā daridrasattvāśca dhanāṃllabhantu /
XXbsu035_u:385: prabhūtadhanadhānyavicitraratnāḥ sarve ca sattvāḥ sukhino bhavantu //
XXbsu035_u:386: mā kasyaciddhāvatu duḥkhavedanā sudarśanāḥ sattva bhavantu sarve /
XXbsu035_u:388: manaḥśāntapaurāḥ susamṛddhapuṇyāḥ vīṇā mṛdaṅgā paṭahā sughoṣā /
XXbsu035_u:389: utsāḥ sarāḥ puṣkariṇī taḍāgāḥ suvarṇapadmotpalapadminībhiḥ // Suv_4.83 //
XXbsu035_u:390: sahacittamātreṇa tu teṣa bhontu annaṃ ca pānaṃ ca tathaiva vastram /
XXbsu035_u:392: mā duḥkhaśabdāḥ kvaci loki bhontu bhā caikasattvaḥ pratikūladarśī /
XXbsu035_u:393: sarve ca te bhontu udāravarṇāḥ prabhākarā bhontu paraspareṇa // Suv_4.85
XXbsu035_u:394: yā kāci saṃpatti manuṣyaloke sā teṣu bhotū manasopapattiḥ /
XXbsu035_u:396: sarvābhiprāyā sahacittamātraiḥ puṇyena phalena paripūrayantu // Suv_4.86
XXbsu035_u:397: gandhaṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ ca dhūpaṃ ca cūrṇaṃ kusumaṃ ca pūrṇam /
XXbsu035_u:398: trikāle vṛkṣehi pravarṣayantu gṛhṇantu te sattva bhavantu tuṣṭāḥ //
XXbsu035_u:399: kurvantu pūjāṃ daśasū diśāsu acintiyāṃ sarvatathāgatānām /
XXbsu035_u:401: nīcāṃ gatiṃ sarvi vivarjayantu tarantu aṣṭāṅgikavīcivṛttāḥ /
XXbsu035_u:402: āsādayantu jinarājamūrti labhantu buddhehi sadā samāgamam // Suv_4.89 //
XXbsu035_u:403: uccaiḥ kulīnā hi bhavantu nityaṃ prabhūtadhanadhānyasamṛddhakośāḥ /
XXbsu035_u:404: rūpeṇa śauryeṇa yaśena kīrtyā samalaṅkṛtā bhontu anekakalpān // Suv_4.90
XXbsu035_u:405: sarvā striyo nitya narā bhavantu śūrāśca vīrāśca vijñapaṇḍitāśca /
XXbsu035_u:406: te sarvi bodhāya carantu nityaṃ carantu te pāramitāsu ṣaṭsu // Suv_4.91 //
XXbsu035_u:410: pāpāni karmāṇi mayā jitāni pūrvārjitā yadbhavasaṃkaṭeṣu /
XXbsu035_u:411: ye pāpakarmābhiratā vahante te sarvi kṣīyantu ca nirviśeṣāḥ // Suv_4.93 //
XXbsu035_u:414: ye cāpi sattvā iha jāmbudvīpe ye cāpi anyaṣu ca lokadhātuṣu /
XXbsu035_u:417: praṇidhānasiddhiḥ saphalā mayāstu spṛśeya bodhiṃ virajāmanuttarām //
XXbsu035_u:418: yo vandate toṣyati daśabalān sadā ca prasannaśuddhāmalamānasena /
XXbsu035_u:419: imāya pariṇāmanadeśanāya ṣaṣṭiṃ ca kalpān jahate apāyān // Suv_4.97 //
XXbsu035_u:420: etebhi ślokebhi ca varṇitebhiḥ puruṣāḥ striyo brahmaṇakṣatriyā ca /
XXbsu035_u:422: yastoṣyate muniṃ sa kṛtāñjalibhiḥ sthihitva sarvatra jātismaru śatajātiṣu // Suv_4.98 //
XXbsu035_u:424: narendrarājaiśca supūjitaḥ sadā etādṛśo bheṣyati tatra tatra // Suv_4.99
XXbsu035_u:425: na tairekasya buddhasya cāntike kuśalaṃ kṛtam /
XXbsu035_u:426: na dvayorapi trayeṣu na pañcasu na daśasu // Suv_4.100 //
XXbsu035_u:433: tena khalu punaḥ kuladevate kālena tena samayena rājā suvarṇabhujendro nāmāsīt
XXbsu035_u:435: ye jina pūrvaka ye ca bhavanti ye ca dhriyanti daśodiśi loke /
XXbsu035_u:436: teṣa jināna karomi praṇāmaṃ taṃ jinasaṃghamahaṃ praśayiṣye // Suv_5.1 //
XXbsu035_u:453: teṣu ca sarvasukhārpitasattvaṃ sarvapraśānta apāyagatīṣu // Suv_5.9 //
XXbsu035_u:462: te 'pi ca niṣṭhita sarvamabhūṣi buddhaprabhāsavirocanatāyai // Suv_5.13 //
XXbsu035_u:468: sūkṣmarajopama ye ca bhavanti sūkṣmarajopama ye ca sthihanti // Suv_5.16
XXbsu035_u:469: teṣa jināna karomi praṇāmaṃ kāyatu vācamanena prasannaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:471: jihvaśatairapi buddhaguṇāni kalpasahasraśate na hi vaktum /
XXbsu035_u:473: ye guṇasādhunivṛtti jinānāṃ sā ca varāgravicitra anekaiḥ // Suv_5.18 //
XXbsu035_u:474: ekajinasya guṇā na hi śakyā jihvaśatairapi bhāṣitu kaścit /
XXbsu035_u:475: kāmamaśakti hi sarvajinānāṃ ekaguṇasya hi vistara vaktum // Suv_5.19 //
XXbsu035_u:477: keśagrahaṇena tu śakya pramātuṃ naiva ca ekaguṇā sugatānām // Suv_5.20 //
XXbsu035_u:478: varṇita saṃstuta me jinasarvaṃ kāyatu vāca prasannamanena /
XXbsu035_u:479: yanmama sañcitapuṇyaphalāgraṃ tena ca sattva prabhotu jinatvam // Suv_5.21
XXbsu035_u:480: evaṃ stavitva narapati buddhaṃ evaṃ karoti nṛpaḥ praṇidhānam /
XXbsu035_u:481: yatra ca kutraci mahya bhaveta jāti anāgatakalpamanantā // Suv_5.22 //
XXbsu035_u:482: īdṛśi bheri mi paśyami svapne īdṛśa deśana tatra śṛṇomi /
XXbsu035_u:483: īdṛśa jīnastutikamalākara jātiṣu tatra labhe smaraṇatvam // Suv_5.23 //
XXbsu035_u:484: buddhaguṇāni anantamatulyā ye 'pi ca durlabha kalpasahasraiḥ /
XXbsu035_u:486: amu śruṇeya ca svapnagato 'pi teṣu ca deśayi divasagato 'pi // Suv_5.24 //
XXbsu035_u:487: duḥkhasamudra vimocayi sattvā pūrayi ṣaḍabhi pi pāramitābhiḥ /
XXbsu035_u:488: bodhimanuttara paśca labheyaṃ kṣetra bhaveta mamā asamarthyam // Suv_5.25
XXbsu035_u:490: saṃmukha paśyami śākyamunīndraṃ vyākaraṇaṃ hyahu tatra labheyam //
XXbsu035_u:491: ye ima dāraka dvau mama putrau kanakendra kanakaprabhāsvaraḥ /
XXbsu035_u:492: te ubhi dāraka tatra labheyaṃ bodhimanuttara vyākaraṇaṃ ca // Suv_5.27 //
XXbsu035_u:493: ye 'pi ca sattva arakṣa atrāṇā śaraṇavihīna viyāsagatāśca /
XXbsu035_u:494: teṣu bhaveya anāgata sarva trāṇaparāyaṇaśaraṇebhiśca // Suv_5.28 //
XXbsu035_u:496: kalpa anāgata bodhi careyaṃ yattaka pūrvakakoṭigatāśca // Suv_5.29 //
XXbsu035_u:499: karmasamudra vikīryatu mahyaṃ kleśasamudra vicchidyatu mahyam // Suv_5.30
XXbsu035_u:500: puṇyasamudra prapūryatu mahyaṃ jñānasamudra viśodhyatu mahyam /
XXbsu035_u:503: puṇyaprabhāsa bhaviṣyati mahyaṃ bodhiprabhāsa viśodhyatu mahyam //
XXbsu035_u:504: kāyaprabhāsa bhaviṣyati mahyaṃ puṇyaprabhāsa virocanatā ca /
XXbsu035_u:505: sarvatriloki viśiṣṭa bhaveyaṃ pūṇyabalena samanvita nityam // Suv_5.33 //
XXbsu035_u:513: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata //
XXbsu035_u:515: tasmādime sūtravarottame vaḥ saṃkṣepato deśita śūnyadharmāḥ // Suv_6.1 //
XXbsu035_u:516: sattvo 'lpabuddhiravijānamāno na śakya jñātuṃ khalu sarvadharmā /
XXbsu035_u:517: paśyeha sūtrendravarottamena saṃkṣepato deśita śūnyadharmāḥ // Suv_6.2 //
XXbsu035_u:519: prakāśitaṃ sūtravarendrametaṃ yathābhijānanti hi sarvasattvāḥ // Suv_6.3
XXbsu035_u:520: ayaṃ ca kāyo yatha śūnyagrāmaḥ ṣaḍgrāma coropama indriyāṇi /
XXbsu035_u:521: tānyekagrāme nivasanti sarve na te vijānanti paraspareṇa // Suv_6.4 //
XXbsu035_u:523: ghrāṇendriyaṃ gandhavicitrahāri jihvandriyaṃ nitya raseṣu dhāvati //
XXbsu035_u:526: ṣaḍindriyāṇīti paraspareṇa svakaṃ svakaṃ viṣayamabhidhāvati // Suv_6.6 //
XXbsu035_u:527: cittaṃ hi māyopama cañcalaṃ ca ṣaḍindriyaṃ viṣayavicāraṇaṃ ca /
XXbsu035_u:528: yathā naro dhāvati śūnyagrāme saṃgrāma caurebhi samāśritaśca // Suv_6.7 //
XXbsu035_u:529: cittaṃ yathā ṣaḍviṣayāśritaṃ ca prajānate indriya gocaraṃ ca /
XXbsu035_u:530: rūpaṃ ca śabdaṃ ca tathaiva gandhaṃ rasaṃ ca sparśa tatha dharmagocaram //
XXbsu035_u:531: cittaṃ ca sarvatra ṣaḍindriyeṣu śakuniriva cañcalaṃ indriyasaṃpraviṣṭam /
XXbsu035_u:532: yatra yatrendriyasaṃśritaṃ ca na cendriyaṃ kurvatu jānamātmakam // Suv_6.9
XXbsu035_u:533: kāyaśca niśceṣṭa nirvyāpāraṃ ca asārakaḥ pratyayasaṃbhavaśca /
XXbsu035_u:537: paraspareṇaiva sadā viruddhā yathaiva āśīviṣa ekaveśmani // Suv_6.11 //
XXbsu035_u:538: dhātūragāste ca caturvidhāni dve ūrdhvagāmī dvaya heṣṭagāmī /
XXbsu035_u:539: dvayādvayaṃ diśi vidiśāsu sarvaṃ naśyanti tā dhātubhujaṅgamāni // Suv_6.12
XXbsu035_u:540: kṣityuragaśca saliloragaśca imau ca heṣṭā kṣayatāṃ vrajete /
XXbsu035_u:541: tejoragaścānilamārutoraga imau hi dve ūrdhvagatau nabho 'nte // Suv_6.13
XXbsu035_u:542: cittaṃ ca vijñānamadhyasthitaṃ ca gatvā yathā pūrvakṛtena karmāṇā /
XXbsu035_u:543: deve manuṣyaeṣu ca triṣvapāyā yathākṛtaṃ pūrvabhave pravarttyā // Suv_6.14
XXbsu035_u:545: nirābhirāmaḥ kṛmikṣudrapūrṇaḥ kṣiptaḥ śmaśāne yatha kāṣṭhabhūtaḥ //
XXbsu035_u:546: paśyāhi tvaṃ devata ebhi evaṃ katyatra sattvastatha pudgalo vā /
XXbsu035_u:548: śūnyā hi ete khalu sarvadharmā avidyataḥ pratyayasaṃbhavāśca // Suv_6.16
XXbsu035_u:550: tasmācca bhūtā hi asaṃbhavāśca avidyamānā na kadāci vidyate // Suv_6.17 //
XXbsu035_u:552: tasmānmayā ukta avidya eṣā saṃskāravijñāna sanāmarūpam // Suv_6.18 //
XXbsu035_u:553: ṣaḍāyatanasparśa tathaiva vedanā tṛṣṇā upādāna tathā bhavaśca /
XXbsu035_u:554: jātijarāmaraṇaśoka upadravāṇāṃ duḥkhāni saṃskāra acintiyāni // Suv_6.19 //
XXbsu035_u:555: saṃsāracakre ca yathā sthitāni abhūta saṃbhūta asaṃbhavāśca /
XXbsu035_u:556: ayoniśaścittavicāraṇaṃ tathā dṛṣṭīgataṃ chetsyatha ātmanaiva // Suv_6.20
XXbsu035_u:557: jñānāsinā chindatha kleśajālaṃ skandhālayaṃ paśyatha śūnyabhūtam /
XXbsu035_u:558: sparśetha taṃ bodhiguṇaṃ hyudāraṃ vivarta ca me amṛtapurasya dvāram //
XXbsu035_u:559: saṃdarśi taṃ amṛtapurasya bhājanaṃ pravekṣya taṃ amṛtapurālayaṃ śubham /
XXbsu035_u:561: tarpiṣya ha amṛtatarasena ātmanāṃ parāhatā me varadharmabherīḥ // Suv_6.22
XXbsu035_u:562: āpūrito me varadharmaśaṅkhaḥ prajvālitā me varadharma ulkā /
XXbsu035_u:563: suvarṣitaṃ me varadharmavarṣaṃ parājitā me parakleśaśatravaḥ // Suv_6.23
XXbsu035_u:564: ucchrepitaṃ me varadharmadhvajaṃ pratāritā me bhavasattvasamudrāḥ /
XXbsu035_u:565: pidhitāni me 'pāyapathāni trīṇi kleśāgnidāhaṃ śamayitva prāṇinām //
XXbsu035_u:566: yasmāddhi pūrvamahamanekakalpān acintiyā pūjitva nāyakā hi /
XXbsu035_u:567: caritva bodhāya dṛḍhavratena saddharmakāyaṃ pariveṣamāṇaḥ // Suv_6.25 //
XXbsu035_u:568: hastau ca pādau ca parityajitvā dhanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ maṇimuktabhūṣaṇam /
XXbsu035_u:571: sarvaṃ ca cūrṇayitvā tat kuryāt sūkṣmarajopamam // Suv_6.27 //
XXbsu035_u:575: sarvasattvā aneke hi jñānavata tathaiva ca /
XXbsu035_u:576: sarvaṃ gaṇayituṃ śakyaṃ na tu jñātaṃ jinasya ca // Suv_6.29 //
XXbsu035_u:578: anekakalpakoṭīṣu na śakyaṃ gaṇayituṃ kvacit // Suv_6.30 //
XXbsu035_u:582: atha khalu vaiśravaṇo mahārājo dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājo virūḍhako mahārājo virūpākṣo mahārāja utthāyasanebhya ekāṃsena cīvarāṇi prāvṛtya dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocan /
XXbsu035_u:584: suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājaḥ sarvatathāgatabhāṣitaḥ sarvatathāgatāvalokitaḥ sarvatathāgatasamanvāgataḥ sarvabodhisattvagaṇanamaskṛtaḥ sarvadevagaṇapūjitaḥ sarvedevendragaṇasaṃpraharṣakaḥ sarvalokapālastutaḥ stavito varṇitaḥ praśaṃsitaḥ sarvadevabhavanāvabhāsitaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ paramasukhapradāyakaḥ sarvanarakatiryagyoniyamalokaduḥkhasaṃśodhakaḥ
XXbsu035_u:585: sarvabhayapratiśamanaḥ sarvaparacakrapratinivartako durbhikṣakāntārapraśamano vyādhikāntārapraṇāśako jñānaprakāśakaḥ paramaśāntikaraḥ śokāyāsapraśamano vividhanānopadravyapraśamayitopadravaśatasahasrapraṇāśayitā imamasya bhadanta bhagavan suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājasya vistareṇa parṣadi saṃprakāśyamānasyāsmākaṃ catūrṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇām /
XXbsu035_u:586: etena ca dharmaśravaṇena dharmāmṛtarasena ca divyātmabhāvamahātejasā vivardhayiṣyanti // asmākaṃ kāyeṣu vīryaṃ ca balaṃ sthāma ca saṃjanitaṃ bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu035_u:587: tejaśca śriyaṃ ca lakṣmīṃ cāsmākaṃ kāyeṣvāviśanti /
XXbsu035_u:588: vayaṃ bhagavaṃścatvāro mahārājā dhārmikāśca dharmavādinaśca dharmarājā dharmeṇa vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍanaramahoragāṇāṃ rājatvaṃ kārayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:589: te vayaṃ bhagavan, catvāro mahārājāḥ sārdhamaṣṭāviṃśatiyakṣasenāpatibhiranekaiśca yakṣaśatasahasraiḥ satatasamitaṃ sarve jambudvīpaṃ divyena viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa vyavalokayiṣyāma ārakṣayiṣyāmaḥ paripācayiṣyāmaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:590: tena hetunā bhadanta bhagavannasmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ lokapāla iti saṃjñotpāditā //
XXbsu035_u:592: ye kecidbhadanta bhagavannasmin jambudvīpe viparyāsāḥ paracakreṇa copahatā
XXbsu035_u:594: bhaviṣyanti, te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan catvāro mahārājā idamasya suvarṇaprabhāsoottamasūtrendrarājasya teṣāṃ ca sūtredradhāriṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ
XXbsu035_u:596: yadā ceme bhadanta bhagavan dharmabhāṇakā bhikṣavo
XXbsu035_u:597: 'smākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ saṃcodanayā buddhādhiṣṭhānena ca yeṣu
XXbsu035_u:598: viṣayeṣūpasaṃkrameyusteṣu te viṣayeṣuḥ cemaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeyuḥ /
XXbsu035_u:600: yasya ca bhadanta bhagavan manuṣyarājasya viṣaye te sūtrendradhārakā bhikṣavā dharmabhāṇākā upasaṃkrāntā bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu035_u:601: ayaṃ ca manuṣyarāja imaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsasūtrendrarājaṃ śṛṇyāt /
XXbsu035_u:602: śrutvā ca teṣāṃ sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ sarvapratyarthikebhya ārakṣāṃ kuryāt paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ kuryāt /
XXbsu035_u:603: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan catvāro mahārājāstasya manuṣyarājasya sarvaviṣayagatānāṃ ca sattvānāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:604: yadā ca bhadanta bhagavan sarvamanuṣyarājaḥ sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sukhatāṃ kuryāt /
XXbsu035_u:605: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavan catvāro mahārājāstaṃ manuṣyarājaṃ sarvarājebhyaḥ satkṛtataraṃ kariṣyāmo gurukṛtaṃ ca kariṣyāmo mānitaṃ ca pūjitaṃ ca sarvaviṣayeṣu ca prasaṃśanīyaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:607: sādhu sādhu mahārājāḥ sādhu sādhu yuṣmākaṃ mahārājāḥ /
XXbsu035_u:608: yathāpi te yūyaṃ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā avaropitakuśalamūlā bahubuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparyupāsitā dharmikāśca dharmavādinaśca dharmeṇa devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca rājatvaṃ kārayadhvam /
XXbsu035_u:609: yathāpi pūrvadīrgharātraṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hitacittāḥ sukhamaitrīcittāḥ sarvasattvahitasukhādhyāśayapratipannāḥ (Bagchi 38) sarvāhitapratiṣedhikāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvahitopasaṃhārābhiyuktāḥ /
XXbsu035_u:610: te yūyaṃ catvāro mahārājāsteṣāṃ manuṣyarājasya ca suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājasya pūjāsatkārābhiyuktānāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyata paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyata /
XXbsu035_u:611: tena yuṣmābhiścaturmahārājaiḥ sabalaparivārairanekaiśca yakṣaśatasahasrairatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmanetryārakṣitā bhaviṣyati paripālitā ca
XXbsu035_u:613: tena yuṣmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇamanekeṣāṃ yakṣaśatasahasrāṇāṃ devānāṃ devāsurasaṃgrāme jayo bhaviṣyati, asurāṇāṃ ca parijayo bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:614: sarvaparacakrapramardakasya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājasyārthāya teṣāṃ sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyata paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyata //
XXbsu035_u:615: atha vaiśravaṇo mahārājo dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājo viruḍhako mahārājo virūpākṣo mahārāja utthāyāsanebhya ekāṃsāni cīvaraiḥ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇāni jānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocan /
XXbsu035_u:617: suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājo 'nāgate 'dhvani yatra grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu pracariṣyati yasya yasya manuṣyarājasya viṣayamanuprāpto bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:618: kaścidbhadanta bhagavanmanuṣyarājo bhagavan yenānena devendrasamayena rājaśāsreṇa rājatvaṃ kārayet /
XXbsu035_u:619: asya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya śrotā bhavaṃstāśca sūtrendradhārakā bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayetsatatasamitaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājaṃ śṛṇuyāt anena dharmaśravaṇena saṃcodanadharmāmṛtapuṇyātmakānāmasmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sakalaparivārāṇāmanekeṣāṃ ca yakṣarākṣasaśatasahasrāṇāmimān divyātmabhāvān mahataujasā vivardhayet /
XXbsu035_u:620: mahāntaṃ vīryaṃ ca sthāma ca balaṃ cāsmākaṃ kāyeṣu tejaḥśriyaśca lakṣmī cāsmākaṃ vivardhayet
XXbsu035_u:621: tena vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavaṃścatvāro mahārājāḥ sabalaparivārā anekaiḥ (Bagchi 39)
XXbsu035_u:624: teṣāṃ ca manuṣyarājānāmasya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya śrotṝṇāṃ mātāpitṝṇāṃ cārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:625: paritrāṇaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śasraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ ca kariṣyāmaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:626: teṣāṃ ca rājakulānāṃ teṣāṃ ca rāṣṭrāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca viṣayāṇāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:627: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śasraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ
XXbsu035_u:628: tāṃśca viṣayān sarvabhayopāyāsebhyaḥ parimocayiṣyāmaḥ paracakrāṇi ca pratinivartayiṣyāmaḥ
XXbsu035_u:629: yaḥ kaścit tasya manuṣyarājasya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya śroturmānayituḥ pūjayituranyaḥ sāmantakaḥ pratiśatrurājā bhavet /
XXbsu035_u:630: yadā ca bhadanta bhagavaṃstasya sāmantakasya pratiśatro rājña evaṃ cittamutpādet /
XXbsu035_u:631: so 'haṃ caturaṅgena balakāyena sārdhamasya viṣayamupasaṃkrameyaṃ vināśayitum /
XXbsu035_u:632: tena khalu punarbhadanta bhagavān kālena tena samayenāsya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya tejo 'nubhāvena tasya sāmantakasya pratiśatrurājasyānyai rājabhiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃgrāme bhaviṣyati svaviṣayagatāśca viṣayavilopāśca bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu035_u:636: yadā ca bhadanta bhagavaṃstasya sāmantakasya pratiśatrurājasya svaviṣayagatānyevaṃrūpāṇi nānopadravaśatāni nānāvyakṣepaśatāni bhaveyuḥ /
XXbsu035_u:637: sa ca bhadanta bhagavan sāmantakapratiśatrurājaścaturaṅgīṇīṃ senāṃ yojayitvā paracakragamanāya svaviṣayānniṣkrānto bhavet /
XXbsu035_u:638: yatrāyaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ sutrendrarājo bhavet sa pratiśatrurājaḥ sārdhaṃ caturaṅgabalakāyena taṃ viṣayamupasaṃkramitukāmo bhavet /
XXbsu035_u:640: te vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavañcatvāro mahārājāḥ sabalaparivārā anekairyakṣarākṣasaśatasahasrairadṛśyairātmabhāvaistatropasaṃkramiṣyāmaḥ taṃ paracakramadhvānaṃ mārgapratipannaṃ (Bagchi 40) tathaiva pratinivartayiṣyāmo nānāvyākṣepaśatāni copasaṃhariṣyāmo vighnāṃśca kariṣyāmaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:641: yathā ca tatparacakraṃ na śakṣyati tatra viṣaya upasaṃkramitum /
XXbsu035_u:643: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sādhukāramadāt /
XXbsu035_u:644: sādhu sādhu mahārājāḥ sādhu khalu punaryuṣmākaṃ mahārājānām /
XXbsu035_u:645: yadyūyamatyā asaṃkhyeyakalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasamudānītāyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherarthāya teṣāṃ manuṣyarājānāmasya ca suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya śrotṝṇāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyatha paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyatha /
XXbsu035_u:646: tāni ca rājakulāni tāni nagarāṇi tāni ca rāṣṭrāṇi tāni ca viṣayāṇyārakṣayiṣyatha /
XXbsu035_u:647: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śasraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kariṣyatha
XXbsu035_u:651: yathā ca te yuṣmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇāmasmiñjambudvīpe teṣu caturṣu nagarasahasreṣu tāni caturaśītinagarasahasrāṇi teṣu teṣu viṣayeṣvabhirameyustena ca rājyaiśvaryeṇābhirameyustena ca dhanaskandhena parasparaṃ na viheṭhayeyuḥ
XXbsu035_u:653: svena ca yathā pūrvakarmopacayena rājatvaṃ pratilabheyuḥ /
XXbsu035_u:654: svena ca rājyaiśvaryeṇa ca tuṣṭā bhaveyuḥ /
XXbsu035_u:657: yathā cāsmiñjambudvīpe teṣu caturaśītiṣu viṣayanagarasahasreṣu tāni caturaśītirāja sahasrāṇi paraspareṇa hitacittāni maitrīcittāni sukhacittāni paraspareṇa kalahayābhaṇḍanayāvigrahayāvivādayā sveṣu sveṣu viṣayeṣvabhiramerantena puṇyena caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇāmayaṃ ca jambudvīpaḥ sphīto bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:668: yatkaścinmahārājo bhaved ya itthamasya suvarṇaprabhāsattamasya sūtrendrarājasya śrotā bhavenmānayitā ca pūjayitā ca teṣāṃ ca sūtrendradhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikānāmautsukyaṃ satkuryād
XXbsu035_u:670: yuṣmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇāmanekeṣāṃ ca yakṣaśatasahasrāṇāmanukampārthāya satatasamitaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaṃ sūtrendrarājendraṃ śṛṇvan /
XXbsu035_u:673: mahacca yuṣmākaṃ vīryaṃ ca sthāma balaṃ ca vapuṣaḥ saṃjanayet /
XXbsu035_u:675: tena ca manuṣyarājena mama śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyācintyā mahāvipulavistīrṇā pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:676: tena tasya manuṣyarājenātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāmanekeṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ koṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāmacintyā mahatī vistīrṇā sarvopakaraṇaiḥ pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:677: tena tasya manuṣyarājasya mahatyārakṣā kṛtā bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:678: tena ca tasya rājño rakṣāṃ paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ daṇḍaparihāraṃ śasraparihāraṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:679: agramahiṣyāśca rājaputrāṇāṃ ca sarvāntaḥpurasya ca rājakulasya ca sarvasya mahatyārakṣā kṛtā bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:680: paritrāṇaṃ parigrahaṃ paripālanaṃ śāntisvastyayanaṃ kṛtaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:681: rājakulanivāsanyaśca sarvadevatā ojovattarāśca cittena sukhasaumanasyena samanvāgatā bhavitāro ratimanubhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu035_u:682: tāni ca rāṣṭrāṇi tāni ca viṣayāṇi cārakṣitāni bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu035_u:685: evamukte vaiśravaṇo mahārājo dhṛtarāṣṭro mahārājo virūḍhako mahārājo virūpākṣo mahārājaste sarve bhagavantametadavocan /
XXbsu035_u:686: tena ca bhagavanmanuṣyarājena susnātagātreṇa bhavitavyaṃ sugandhavāsanadhāriṇā navaruciravastraprāvṛtena nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitena bhavitavyam /
XXbsu035_u:704: tasmiṃśca khalu pugarmahārajāḥ kāle tasminsamaye tena manuṣyarājena sarvaśvetāni pāṇḍurāṇi navarucivastrāṇi prāvaritavyāni /
XXbsu035_u:706: mahatā rājānubhāvena mahatā rājavyūhena nānāvicitraratnamaṅgalaparigṛhītaistato rājakulādabhiniṣkramitavyam
XXbsu035_u:707: tasya ca dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ pratyudgamanāya gantavyam /
XXbsu035_u:709: hetoḥ? yāvanti manuṣyarājastatra padāni bhāvayati tāvanti kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi saṃsārātparāṅmukhāni kariṣyati tāvatāṃ cakravartirājakulakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati yāvanti sa tatra padānyatikramiṣyati tāvatāṃ caiva dṛṣṭadhārmikeṇācintyena mahatā rājyaiśvaryeṇa vivardhiṣyate /
XXbsu035_u:711: anekeṣāṃ ca divyodārāṇāṃ mānuṣyakāṇāṃ rājakulaputraśatasahasrāṇāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:717: udārodārāṇāṃ ca divyamānuṣyakāṇāṃ sukhānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:718: mahābalaśca mahānagnabalavegadhārī cābhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgataśca bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:722: imanyevaṃrūpāṇi mahārājaguṇānuśaṃsāni saṃpaśyamānena tena rājñā dharmabhāṇako yojanātpratyutthātavyaḥ
XXbsu035_u:725: adya mama śākyamunistathāgato 'rhansamyaksaṃbuddha iha rājakule pravekṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:726: adya mama śākyamunistathāgato 'rhansamyaksaṃbuddha iha rājakule svajanamanuśasiṣyate /
XXbsu035_u:731: adya mayātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmacintyā mahatī vipulā vistīrṇā pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:738: adya mama sarvāntaḥpurasya mahatyārakṣā kṛtā bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu035_u:739: adya mama rājakule 'cintyā samabiśiṣṭānuttarā mahatī śāntiḥ kṛtā bhaviṣyati svastyayanaṃ ca /
XXbsu035_u:742: yadā ca mahārājāḥ sa manuṣyarājo 'nenaivaṃrūpeṇa saddharmagauraveṇa suvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarājadhārakā
XXbsu035_u:743: satkuryādgurukuryānmānayedyuṣmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ sabalaparivārāṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca devagaṇānāmanekeṣāṃ ca yakṣaśatasahasrāṇāṃ mahā tathā dharmāṅgapratyakṣaṃ dadyāt yena caivāsau manuṣyarājaḥ puṇyabhisaṃskāreṇa kuśalābhisaṃskāreṇa ca tenaiva cātmabhāvena ca dṛṣṭadhārmikeṇācintyena mahatā rājyaiśvaryeṇa vivardhayiṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:745: śriyā ca tejasā ca lakṣmyā cālaṃkṛto bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:749: yaḥ kaścidbhadanta bhagavanmanuṣyarājo bhavet so 'nenaivaṃrūpeṇa dharmagauraveṇemaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaṃ sūtrendrarājaṃ śṛṇuyāt /
XXbsu035_u:751: asmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāmarthāya tadrājakulaṃ suśodhitaṃ śodhayet /
XXbsu035_u:753: taṃ ca dharmaśrāvaṇamasmābhiścaturbhiśca mahārājaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ śṛṇyādātmano 'rthāya sarvadevatā ca kiṃcinmātraṃ kuśalaṃ pratyakṣaṃ dadyāt /
XXbsu035_u:754: samantaraniṣaṇṇasya ca bhadanta bhagavaṃstasya bhikṣordhamāsanagatasya tena manuṣyarājenāsmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāmarthāya nānāgandhā dhūpayitavyāḥ /
XXbsu035_u:755: sahadhūpiteṣu bhadanta bhagavaṃstasya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya pūjārthāya nānāgandheṣu nānāgandhadhūpalatā niścaranti /
XXbsu035_u:761: brahmaṇaḥ sahāṃpateḥ śakrasya ca devānāmindrasya sarasvatyāśca mahādevyā dṛḍhāyāśca mahādevyāḥ śriyaśca mahādevyāḥ saṃjayasya ca mahāyakṣasenāpateraṣṭāviṃśatīnāṃ ca mahāyakṣasenāpatīnaṃ maheśvarasya ca devaputrasya vajrapāṇeśca mahāyakṣasenāpatermāṇibhadrasya ca mahāyakṣasenāpaterhārītyāśca pañcaputraśataparivārāṇāmanavataptasya ca nāgarājasya caiteṣāṃ bhadanta bhagavansvakasvakabhavanagatānām tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtenoparyantarīkṣe nānāgandhadhūpalatāchatrāṇi saṃsthāsyanti /
XXbsu035_u:766: na kevalaṃ yuṣmākaṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāṃ svakasvakabhavanagatānāmuparyantarīkṣagatāti nānāgandhadhūpalatāchatrāṇi saṃsthāsyanti /
XXbsu035_u:768: sahapradhūpitāśca mahārājāstena manuṣyarājena nānāgandhā asya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya pūjopasthānāya /
XXbsu035_u:770: tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena sarvasyāmasyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau yatra koṭīśataṃ candrāṇāṃ (Bagchi 45) koṭīśataṃ sumerūṇāṃ parvatarājānāṃ
XXbsu035_u:771: koṭīśataṃ cakravāḍamahācakravāḍānāṃ parvatarājānāṃ koṭīśataṃ caturmahādvīpānāṃ koṭīśataṃ caturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ koṭīśataṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ koṭīśataṃ yāvannaivasaṃjñāyatanopagānāṃ devānām sarvatra ca teṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātukoṭīśateṣu trayastriṃśeṣu devanikāyeṣu sarveṣāṃ ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragāṇāṃ ca bhavanagatānāṃ coparyantarīkṣagatāni nānāgandhadhūpalatāchatrāṇi saṃsthāsyanti /
XXbsu035_u:778: yathā trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvadevabhavanānyuparyantarīkṣe tāni nānāgandhadhūpalatāchatrāṇi saṃsthāsyanti /
XXbsu035_u:779: tathā cāsya mahārājāḥ suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya tejasā kuṇḍahastena dhūpitāstena manuṣyarājena nānāgandhā asya suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya pūjārthāya nānāgandhadhūpalatāchatrāṇi saṃsthāsyanti /
XXbsu035_u:780: tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena samantāddaśasu dikṣvanekeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu buddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasreṣvanekeṣāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ tathāgatakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāmuparyantarīkṣe tāni nānāgandhadhūpalatāchatrāṇi saṃsthāsyanti /
XXbsu035_u:784: samanantaraprādurbhūtāni ca mahārājā imānyevaṃrūpāṇi mahāprātihāryāṇi tānyanekāni gaṅgānadīvālukāsamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi pratiṣṭhitāstathāgatāstaṃ ca dharmabhāṇakaṃ samanvāhariṣyanti sādhukārāṇi ca pradāsyanti sādhu sādhu satpuruṣa sādhu punastvaṃ satpuruṣa /

XXbsu035_u:1089: annena vā pānena vā dhanena vā dhānyena vā hiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktavaiḍūryaśaṅkhaśilāpravālajātarūparajatādibhiranyaiścopakaraṇaiḥ sarvopakaraṇasamṛddhāni sattvāni bhaviṣyanti śriyo mahādevyāḥ prabhāvena /

XXbsu035_u:1111: tasya ca suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasyānubhāvena tena kālena śrīrmahādevī tasya gṛha samanvāhariṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:1118: teṣāṃ namaskṛtya vidyāṃ prayojayāmi iyaṃ me vidyā samṛdhyatu /
XXbsu035_u:1128: samavadhāribhiravaruptakuśalamūlaiḥ prāvṛtadhārayamāṇaiḥ sa saptavarṣā aṣṭāṅgopetā sapañcāsina pūrvāhṇe /
XXbsu035_u:1130: sarvabuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ puṣpadhūpagandhapūjāṃ kṛtvātmanaśca sarvasattvānāṃ ca sarvajñajñānasya paripūraṇāya /
XXbsu035_u:1133: tadgṛhaṃ sa caukṣaṃ kṛtvā vihāraṃ cāraṇyāyatanaṃ vāṃ gomayena maṇḍalakaṃ kṛtvā gandhapuṣpadhūpaṃ ca dātavyam /
XXbsu035_u:1138: tadupādāya tatra gṛhe vā grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā vihāre vāraṇyāyatane vā na jātu kenacidvaikalpaṃ kariṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:1139: hiraṇyena vā suvarṇena vā ratnena vā dhanena vā dhānyādisarvopakaraṇasamṛddhābhioḥ sarvasukhopadhānena sukhitāni bhaviṣyanti /
XXbsu035_u:1141: tena sarvaṃ śriyo mahādevyāḥ premaprabhāvapreṣaṇaṃ dātavyaṃ yāvajjīvaṃ tatropasthāsyati na

XXbsu035_u:1167: yatra yatra bhagavanpṛthivīpradeśe tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣo ṛjukāyagatasya dharmāsanaprajñaptaṃ bhaviṣyati /

XXbsu035_u:1169: tatrāhaṃ bhadanta bhagavandṛḍhā pṛthivīdevatā teṣu pṛthivīpradeśeṣvāgamiṣyāmi /

XXbsu035_u:1173: ātmānaṃ ca saṃtarpayitvā pratimānayitvā saṃpraharṣayitvemamaṣṭaṣaṣṭiyojanasahasrāṇi pṛthivīskandhamātmānaṃ cānena dharmaśravaṇena dharmāmṛtarasena yāvadvajramayaṃ pṛthivītalamupādāya pṛthivīrasenavivardhayiṣyāmi saṃpratimānayiṣyāmi paripūrayiṣyāmi /

XXbsu035_u:1180: tejobalavarṇarūpasamanvāuatāśca bhūtvā nānāvidhāni pṛthivīgatānyanekāni nānākāryaśatasahasrāṇi kariṣyantyutthāsyanti vyāpayiṣyanti /

XXbsu035_u:1199: avaśyamayaṃ suvarṇaprabhāsottamaḥ sūtrendrarājaḥ satkṛtya śrotavyaḥ satkartavyo gurukartavyo mānayitavyaḥ pūjayitavyaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1200: yadā ca bhadanta bhagavaṃste sarve sattvā nānākulebhyo nānāgṛhebhyo niṣkrameyusteṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmupasakramaṇāya
XXbsu035_u:1202: śrutvā ca punareva te sattvāḥ svakasvakeṣu nānākuleṣu gṛhagrāmanagaranigameṣu praviṣṭāḥ svagṛhagatāṃ paraspareṇaivaṃ kathayeyuḥ /

XXbsu035_u:1210: yatra yatra bhadanta bhagavaṃstāni nānāvidhāni sattvāni nānāvidheṣu pṛthivīpradeśaṣvimānyevaṃrūpāṇi nānāvidhāni sūtrāntahetūni paraspareṇārocayeyuḥ saṃśrāvayeyuśca /

XXbsu035_u:1215: sarvāṇi tāni sattvāni mahādhanāni mahābhogāni ca dānādhimuktāni ca bhaviṣyanti /

XXbsu035_u:1219: teṣu saptasu kāmāvacareṣu devanikāyeṣu saptaratnamayāni divyāni vimānāni sarvālaṃkārasamalaṃkṛtāni saṃsthāsyanti te sattvā ito manuṣyalokāccyāvitvā teṣu saptaratnamayeṣu divyavimāneṣūpapatsyante te caikaikasminpṛthivīdevate saptaratnamaye divyavimāne saptavarā anupapatsyante acintyāni divyāni sukhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti //

XXbsu035_u:1239: teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ dharmaśravaṇikānāṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāṇāṃ yeṣāṃ keṣāṃciditaḥ suvarṇaprabhāsottamātsūtrendrarājādantaśa ekā catuṣpādikāpi gāthā śrutā bhavedantaśa ekapadamapi suvarṇaprabhāsottamātsūtrendrarājādekabodhisattvanāmadheyamapi śrutaṃ bhavedudgṛhītaṃ vaikatathāgatanāmadheyaṃ vāntaśaścāsya
XXbsu035_u:1240: suvarṇaprabhāsottamasya sūtrendrarājasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutaṃ bhavedudgṛhītaṃ vā teṣāṃ sarveṣāmārakṣāṃ kariṣyāmi /

XXbsu035_u:1255: acintyo me bhadanta bhagavansarvadharmeṣu jñānaviṣayaḥ pravartate /

XXbsu035_u:1261: mahāntaṃ ca tasya sthāma ca balaṃ vīryaṃ ca kāye saṃjanayiṣyāmi /
XXbsu035_u:1265: yathā ca sa dharmabhāṇako na klāntakāyo bhavet /

XXbsu035_u:1277: iti śrīsuvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarāje saṃjñeyamahāyakṣasenāpati parivarto nāma dvādaśaḥ

XXbsu035_u:1286: yanmayā pūrvamacirābhiṣiktena ca rājyapratiṣṭhitena pitū rājño balendraketoḥ sakāśādudgṛhītam

XXbsu035_u:1312: api vai devasaṃbhūto devaputraḥ sa ucyate // Suv_13.10 //
XXbsu035_u:1314: putrastvaṃ saha devānāṃ nirmito manujeśvaraḥ // Suv_13.11 //
XXbsu035_u:1317: manuṣyo vātha devo vā gandharvo vā narādhipaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1318: rākṣaso vātha caṇḍālo duṣkṛtānāṃ nivārakaḥ // Suv_13.13 //
XXbsu035_u:1319: mātā pitā vā nṛpatiḥ sukṛtau karmakāriṇām /

XXbsu035_u:1324: nānārūpaṃ na kurvīta daṇḍaṃ pāpajanasya ca /
XXbsu035_u:1327: śāṭhyāni kalahāścaiva bhūyo rāṣṭre bhavanti ca /
XXbsu035_u:1329: yadā hyupekṣate rājā duṣkṛtaṃ viṣaye sthiram /

XXbsu035_u:1333: vividhāni ca śāṭhyāni haranti ca parasparam /

XXbsu035_u:1372: glānena bahulāḥ sattvā bhavanti viṣayeṣu ca /

XXbsu035_u:1730: abhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgato nānāśāstrakuśalaḥ sarvaśāstragatiṃgato lipisaṃkhyāgaṇanākuśalaḥ sarvaśilpī babhūva /
XXbsu035_u:1731: tena khalu punaḥ kuladevate kālena tena samayena tasya rājñaḥ sureśvaraprabhasya viṣaye 'nekāni sattvaśatasahasrāṇi nānārogaspṛṣṭānyabhūvan /
XXbsu035_u:1732: nānāvyādhiparipīḍitāni duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti //
XXbsu035_u:1733: tena khalu punaḥ kuladevate kālena tena samayena tasya jalavāhanasya śreṣṭhiputrasya teṣāmanekeṣāṃ sattvaśatasahasrāṇāṃ nānārogaspṛṣṭānāṃ nānāvyādhiparipiḍitānāmarthāya paramakāruṇyaṃ cittamutpanno babhūva /
XXbsu035_u:1734: etānyanekāni sattvaśatasahasrāṇi nānārogaspṛṣṭāni nānāvyādhiparipīḍitānyetarhi duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukāmamanāpāṃ vedanāṃ vedayanti /
XXbsu035_u:1735: ayaṃ ca mama pitā jaṭiṃdharaḥ śreṣṭhī vaidyavicikitsakaḥ paramadhātukuśalo 'ṣṭāṅgāyurvaidyaśāstreṇa samanvāgato vṛddho jīrṇo
XXbsu035_u:1736: (Bagchi 94) mahallako 'dhvagato vayo 'nuprāpto jīrṇamavasthāpya pravepamāṇaḥ kāyo yaṣṭimālambya yatra yatra sarvatra grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣūpasaṃkrāmati /
XXbsu035_u:1737: etānyanekāni sattvaśatasahasrāṇi nānārogaspṛṣṭāni nānāvyādhiparipīḍitāni nānāvyādhobhyaḥ parimocayituṃ yaṃ nūnamahamimameva pitaraṃ jaṭiṃdharamupasaṃkramitvādhikauśalyaṃ paripṛccheyam /
XXbsu035_u:1739: upasaṃkramya tānyanekāni sattvaśatasahasrāṇi nānārogaspṛṣṭāni nānāvyādhiparipīḍitāni nānāvyādhibhyaḥ parimocayiṣyāmi /
XXbsu035_u:1740: tena khalu punaḥ kuladevate kālena tena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputro yena svapitā jaṭiṃdharaḥ śreṣṭhī tenopajagāma /
XXbsu035_u:1741: upetya svapiturjaṭiṃdharasya pādau śirasā vanditvā kṛtāñjalipuṭo bhūtvaikānte
XXbsu035_u:1743: ekānte sthito jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputraḥ svapitaraṃ jaṭiṃdharaṃ śreṣṭhinamimābhirgāthābhirdhātukauśalyaṃ pṛcchati sma //
XXbsu035_u:1745: kena kālena jāyante vyādhayaśca śarīriṇām // Suv_17.1 //
XXbsu035_u:1746: bhojanaṃ ca kathaṃ bhuktvā kāle kāle sukhāvaham /
XXbsu035_u:1748: kathaṃ cikitsā kartavyā vāte pitte śleṣmike tathā /
XXbsu035_u:1750: kiṃ kāle kupyate vātaḥ pittaṃ kupyate kadā /
XXbsu035_u:1751: kiṃ kāle kupyate śleṣmā yena pīḍyanti mānavāḥ // Suv_17.4 //
XXbsu035_u:1752: atha khalu jaṭiṃdharaḥ śreṣṭhī jalavāhanasya śreṣṭhiputrasyābhirgāthābhirdhātukauśalyaṃ viditvā deśayate sma //
XXbsu035_u:1753: varṣā cātra trayo māsāstrayaśca śāradaṃ smṛtam /
XXbsu035_u:1757: annaṃ ca pānaṃ ca tathā ca jīryate vaidyāśca kauśalyasmṛtipradarśitāḥ //
XXbsu035_u:1759: parivartamānāni ca indriyāṇi vicitravyādhirbhavate śarīriṇām // Suv_17.7
XXbsu035_u:1760: tatraiva vaidyasya catuḥ prakāraṃ trimāsaparvāntare ṣaḍṛtūni /
XXbsu035_u:1762: vātādhikārāḥ prabhavanti varṣe pattiprakopaḥ śaradi prasanne /
XXbsu035_u:1763: hemantakāle tatha saṃnipātaṃ kaphādhikārāśca bhavanti grīṣme // Suv_17.9
XXbsu035_u:1764: snigdhoṣṇalavaṇāmlarasāśca varṣe śaratsu snigdhaṃ madhuraṃ ca śītam /
XXbsu035_u:1765: madhurāmlasnigdhaṃ ca hemantakāle rūkṣoṣṇakaṭukāni ca grīṣmakāle //
XXbsu035_u:1766: kaphādhikaḥ kupyati bhuktamātre pittādhikaṃ kupyati jīryamāṇe /
XXbsu035_u:1767: vātādhikaḥ kupyati jīrṇamātre ityeva dhātutritayaprakopaḥ // Suv_17.11 //
XXbsu035_u:1769: saṃbṛhaṇaṃ kurvatu nirātmakasya virecanaṃ pittavivardhanaṃ ca /
XXbsu035_u:1770: triguṇopapannaṃ tatha saṃnipāte praśamaṃ ca kuryātkaphaparvamantare //
XXbsu035_u:1772: yatkāla yaddhātu yadāśrayaṃ ca tadannapānauṣadhi darśitavyamiti //
XXbsu035_u:1773: atha khalu jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputrastenaivaṃrūpeṇa naimittikena dhātukauśalyena paripṛṣṭena sarvāṣṭāṅgāyurvaidyamadhigato 'bhūt /
XXbsu035_u:1774: tena khalu punaḥ kuladevate kālena tena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputro rājñaḥ sureśvaraprabhasya viṣaye sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣūpasaṃkramitvā sarveṣāmanekeṣāṃ sattvaśatasahasrāṇāṃ nānārogaspṛṣṭānāṃ nānāvyādhiparipīḍitānāmevamāśvāsayāmāsa /
XXbsu035_u:1777: sahaśravaṇena kuladevate tasya jalavāhanasya śreṣṭhiputrasyedamevaṃrūpaṃ vacanaṃ vyāharamāṇasya sarvāṇi tānyanekāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi mahāpraharṣajātāni babhūvuḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1779: tāni tena kālena tena samayena tayā praharṣayānekāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi nānārogaspṛṣṭāni nānāvyādhiparipīḍitāni nānārogebhyaḥ parimocayitānyarogāṇi ca babhūvurvigatavyādhīni ca /
XXbsu035_u:1781: tena khalu punaḥ kuladevate kālena tena samayena teṣāmanekeṣāṃ ca sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ nānārogaspṛṣṭānāṃ nānāvyādhiparipīḍitānāṃ ye kecidgāḍhatareṇa spṛṣṭā ca babhūvuḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1782: te sarve yena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputrastenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramyaiva ye ca kiṃcitteṣāṃ (Bagchi 97) sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ nānārogaspṛṣṭānāṃ nānāvyādhiparipīḍitānāmauṣadhividhānānyabhinirdiśanti sma /
XXbsu035_u:1783: tattāsu rājadhānīṣu sarvāṇi tānyanekāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi nānārogaspṛṣṭāni nānāvyādhiparipīḍitāni jalavāhanena śreṣṭhiputreṇa nānāvyādhibhyaḥ parimocitāni babhūvuriti //
XXbsu035_u:1784: iti śrīsuvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarāje vyādhipraśamana parivarto nāma saptadaśaḥ //
XXbsu035_u:1787: punaraparaṃ kuladevate rājñaḥ sureśvaraprabhasya viṣaye jalavāhanena śreṣṭhidārakeṇa sarvasattvā ārogāḥ kṛtā alpā bādhā yathāpūrveṇotsāhabalakāyena saṃvṛtāḥ sarva utsāhasukhena ramanti sma krīḍanti sma /
XXbsu035_u:1791: jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahāvaidyadānānāṃ ca sukhānāṃ vyādhivicikitsako niyatapratyakṣeṇa bodhisattvena bhavitavyam /
XXbsu035_u:1793: tasya khalu punaḥ jalavāhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya jalāmbujagarbhā nāma bhāryā 'bhūt /
XXbsu035_u:1794: tasya khalu punaḥ kuladevate jalāmbujagarbhāyā dvau dārakau putrāvabhūtām /
XXbsu035_u:1795: eko jalāmbaro nāma dvitīyo jalagarbho nāma //
XXbsu035_u:1796: atha khalu punaḥ kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputrasyābhyāṃ dārakābhyāṃ sārdhamanupūrveṇa
XXbsu035_u:1797: atha khalu punaḥ kuladevate 'pareṇa tena kālena tena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputro 'nyataramaṭavīkāntāraprāpto 'dhvani dadarśātrāntare māṃsabhakṣā vṛkaśṛgālakākapakṣiṇastāṃ diśaṃ dhāvanti yatrāṭavīkāntāre
XXbsu035_u:1800: kasyārthamime māṃsabhakṣā vṛkaśṛgālakākapakṣiṇa imāṃ diśaṃ dhāvanti /
XXbsu035_u:1804: atha khalu punaḥ kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputro
XXbsu035_u:1807: sa tatrāpaśyadbahūni matsyaśatāni jalaviprahīṇāni tatrāsya kāruṇyacittamutpannam /
XXbsu035_u:1811: kulaputra yastvaṃ jalavāhano nāma matsyānāmudakaṃ prayaccha /
XXbsu035_u:1818: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya bhūyasyā mātrayā paramakāruṇyacittamutpannam
XXbsu035_u:1819: tena khalu punaḥ kuladevate samayenāṭavīsaṃbhavāyāṃ puṣkariṇyā kiṃcinmātramavaśiṣṭamudakamabhūt
XXbsu035_u:1821: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaścaturdiśaṃ dhāvati sma /
XXbsu035_u:1822: yasyāṃ diśi jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'nucaṅkamati tasyāṃ diśi daśamtsyasahasrāṇi jalavāhanaṃ karuṇaṃ prekṣante // atha khalu kuladevate
XXbsu035_u:1827: mahāntaṃ vṛkṣasamūhaṃ taṃ vṛkṣamabhiruhya drumaśākhāñchittvā yena sā puṣkariṇī tenopajagāma
XXbsu035_u:1828: upagamya teṣāṃ daśānāṃ matsyasahasrāṇāṃ drumaśākhābhiḥ suśītalāñchāyāṃ kṛtavān //
XXbsu035_u:1829: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastasyāṃ puṣkariṇyāmudakāgamaṃ paryeṣate kuta udakasyāgamanaṃ bhavet /
XXbsu035_u:1832: tasyāḥ khalu punaḥ kuladevate aṭavīsaṃbhavāyāḥ puṣkariṇyā jalāgamā nāma mahānadī yatastasyāmudakasyāgamanam
XXbsu035_u:1833: tena ca samayena sā ndyanyatareṇa pāpasattvena teṣāṃ daśānāṃ matsyasahasrāṇāmarthena sā nadītyadṛṣṭe sthāne mahāprapāte pātitā yatteṣāṃ matsyānāṃ na bhūya udakasyāgamanaṃ bhaviṣyati /
XXbsu035_u:1834: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā cintayati na śakyata eṣā nadī janasahasreṇāpi tenaiva yathā vāhayituṃ kimaṅga punarmayaikena śakyo bāhayituṃ sa pratinivṛttaḥ //
XXbsu035_u:1835: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputraḥ śīghraṃ śīghramupasaṃkrānto yena rājā (Bagchi 100) sureśvaprabhastenopajagāma /
XXbsu035_u:1836: upagamya rājñaḥ sureśvaraprabhasya pādau śirasā natvaikānte niṣaṇṇaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1838: mayā khalu devasya viṣaye sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu sattvānāṃ vyādhayaḥ praśamitāḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1841: taddadātu me devo viṃśatigajā yathā teṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ jīvitaṃ dadāmīti /
XXbsu035_u:1842: yathā manuṣyāṇāṃ dattamājñaptaṃ khalu rājñā sureśvaraprabheṇāmātyānāṃ dadata mahāvaidyarājasya viṃśatigajān /
XXbsu035_u:1844: upasaṃkrama mahāsattva yena hastiśālā upagṛhṇīṣva viṃśatigajān kuru sattvānāṃ sukham //
XXbsu035_u:1845: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ sārdhaṃ jalāmbareṇa ca svaputreṇa viṃśatigajān gṛhītvā nāgaśauṇḍikānāṃ sakāśācchataśo dṛśīnāṃ pratigṛhya pratinivṛttaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1847: tatropasaṃkramyodakena tā dṛtīḥ pūrayitvā gajapṛṣṭha udakamāropya śīghraṃ śīghraṃ yenāṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1848: upasaṃkramya tadudakaṃ hastipṛṣṭhādavatārya tāṃ puṣkariṇīṃ caturdiśamudakena pūrayitvā caturdiśaṃ ca kramati /
XXbsu035_u:1849: yena yena jalavāhano 'nucaṅkramati tena tena daśamatsyasahasrāṇyanudhāvanti //
XXbsu035_u:1853: nūnamete matsyāḥ kṣudhāgninā paripīḍitā mama sakāśādbhojanaṃ parimārgayanti /
XXbsu035_u:1855: atha khalu kuladevate jalavāhanaḥ svaputraṃ jalāmbarametadavocat /
XXbsu035_u:1856: gaccha kulaputra svakaṃ niveśanaṃ sarvabalataraṃ hastinamabhirūhya ca śīdhraṃ śīghramupasaṃkramya pitāmahasya śreṣṭhina evaṃ vadeha bho tāta jalavāhana evaṃ vadati yatkiṃcidatra gṛhe 'bhisaṃskṛtaṃ bhojanaṃ syānmātāpitrorbhrātṛbhaginyordāsīdāsakarmakarasya (Bagchi 101) kṛtaśaḥ sarvamekatra piṇḍīkṛtvā jalāmbarasya hastipṛṣṭamavaropya jalavāhanāya
XXbsu035_u:1858: atha khalu jalāmbaro dārako hastinamabhiruhya śīghraṃ śīghraṃ dhāvati sma
XXbsu035_u:1859: / yena svakaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmadupasaṃmyaitāṃ prakṛtaṃ pitāmahasyāgra ārocayāmāsa vistareṇa yathā pūrvoktam /
XXbsu035_u:1861: atha khalu jalambaro dārakastadbhojanaṃ hastipṛṣṭhamupanāmya hastinamabhiruhya yenāṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī tenopasaṃkrāmat //
XXbsu035_u:1862: atha khalu jalavāhanaḥ svakaṃ putraṃ jalāmbaramāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭastuṣṭa udagraḥ putrasyāntikādbhojanaṃ pratigṛhya cchittvā tatra puṣkariṇyāṃ prakṣipati sma /
XXbsu035_u:1865: śrutaṃ me pareṇa kālasamayenāraṇyāyatane bhikṣurmahāyānadhārayamāna ityāha /
XXbsu035_u:1866: yo ratnaśikhinastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya maraṇakālasamaye nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyāt
XXbsu035_u:1868: yannūnamahameṣāṃ matsyānāṃ gambhīraṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeyam /
XXbsu035_u:1870: tena ca samayena tasmiñjambudvīpe dvighādṛṣṭiḥ sattvānāmabhūt /
XXbsu035_u:1872: atha khalu punarjalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputrastasyāṃ velāyāmubhau pādau jānumātraṃ tatra puṣkariṇyāṃ praveśyaivaṃ cidānamudānayāmāsa /
XXbsu035_u:1873: namastasya bhagavato ratnaśikhinastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya purvabodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇasya evaṃ praṇidhānamabhūt /
XXbsu035_u:1874: ye keciddaśasu dikṣu maraṇakālasamaye mama nāmadheyaṃ śṛṇuyuste tataścyutvā devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ sabhāgatāyāmupapadyeyuḥ //
XXbsu035_u:1876: atha khalu jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakasteṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāmimaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
XXbsu035_u:1888: jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā bhavatyevamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati yadutāvidyānirodhātsaṃrakāranirodhaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1900: iti hi kuladevate tena kālena tena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputrasteṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāmimāṃ dhārmikakathāṃ kathayati sma /
XXbsu035_u:1901: sārdhaṃ putrābhyāṃ jalāmbareṇa jalagarbheṇa ca punarapi svagṛhamanuprāptaḥ //
XXbsu035_u:1902: athāpareṇa kālena samayena jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhiputro mahotsavaṃ paribhujya mahotsavamatto śayane śayitaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1903: tena ca kālena tena samayena mahānimittaḥ prādurbhūtaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1904: yattasyā rātryāmatyayena tāni daśamatsyasahasrāṇi kālagatāni deveṣu trāyastriṃśatsu sabhāgatāyāmupapannāni
XXbsu035_u:1909: te vayaṃ tiryagyonigatā jalavāhanena śreṣṭhidārakeṇa prabhūtenodakena saṃtarpitā bhojanavareṇa
XXbsu035_u:1912: (Bagchi 103) tena kuśaladharmahetunā tena pratyayeneha vayaṃ deveṣūpapannāḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1915: atha tāni daśadevaputrasahasrāṇi deveṣu trāyastriṃśatsvantarhitāni jalavāhanasya śriṣṭhino gṛhe tasthuḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1916: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ca jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭyupaśayane śayitaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1926: te ca devaputrā rājñaḥ sureśvaraprabhasya viṣaye sthānasthānāntare māndāravapuṣpavarṣaṃ pravarṣayanto yenāṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ te tatra puṣkariṇyāṃ māndāravapuṣpaṃ pravarṣayantastata evāntarhitāḥ punarapi devālayaṃ gatāḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1936: jalavāhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya catvāriṃśanmuktāhārasahasrāṇi pravarṣitāni divyāni ca māndāravapuṣpāṇi nirgacchanti /
XXbsu035_u:1938: bhavanto jalavāhanaṃ śreṣṭhinaṃ dārakaṃ priyavacanena śabdāpayan //
XXbsu035_u:1939: atha te gaṇakamahāmātyā yena jalavāhanasya gṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
XXbsu035_u:1942: atha jalavāhanaḥ śreṣṭhī mahāmātyaiḥ sārdhaṃ yena rājā sureśvaraprabhastenopajagāma /
XXbsu035_u:1945: jalavāhana kiṃ nimittaṃ jānīyā yadadya rātrāvīdṛśāni śubhanimittāni prādurbhūtāni /
XXbsu035_u:1952: kiṃ tāni daśamtsyasahasrāṇi jīvanti atha kālagatāni /
XXbsu035_u:1957: kiṃ tāni daśamatsyasahasrāṇi jivanti atha kālagatāni /
XXbsu035_u:1958: atha jalāmbaro dārakaḥ śīghraṃ śīghraṃ yenāṭavīsaṃbhavā puṣkariṇī tenopajagāma /

XXbsu035_u:2254: manāpaṃ sattvadarśana priyamanāpaṃ na cireṇa vinaṣṭaśramam // Suv_19.46 //
XXbsu035_u:2256: anantāyāsasaṃkaṭāni ghoṣaḥ rājā mahārathotthāya rodamānaḥ // Suv_19.47 //
XXbsu035_u:2257: śokārttaḥ siñcati saliladhāraiḥ agramahiṣīṃ ca dharaṇīye patantīṃ /
XXbsu035_u:2258: siñcati udakena yāvatsmṛtiṃ labhyate utthāya pṛcchiraṃ dīnamānasā //
XXbsu035_u:2259: kiṃ mama putrā hi mṛtā jīvanti rājā mahārathaścāgramahiṣīṃ ca /
XXbsu035_u:2260: evamevāvoca diśi vidiśāsu amātyā pārṣadyā jijñāsārthaṃ gatāḥ // Suv_19.49
XXbsu035_u:2261: kumārāṇāṃ mā tvamatidīnamānasā bhavā hīnāyāsa śokahṛdayā /
XXbsu035_u:2262: evaṃ mahārathaśca kṣamāpayitvā tadāgramahiṣīṃ ca kampo niṣkrame //
XXbsu035_u:2266: rājā putrāṇāṃ bahuprāṇinaḥ aśrumukho rodamāno dhāvati /
XXbsu035_u:2267: nirgataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājānaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubuddho 'tha samanantaraniṣkrāntaḥ
XXbsu035_u:2269: diśatāṃ sugaulanayano dṛṣṭvānyataraṃ puruṣaṃ muṇḍitaśīrṣaṃ ca // Suv_19.53
XXbsu035_u:2273: śīghrabhārādupasaṃkramya nṛpate rājño mahārathasya āvaciṃsu // Suv_19.55
XXbsu035_u:2274: mā śokacittastvaṃ bhava nṛpate tiṣṭhanti te putrāḥ priyamanāpāḥ /
XXbsu035_u:2275: na cireṇāgamya iha tavāntike drakṣyasi tvaṃ putravaraṃ manāpam //
XXbsu035_u:2278: dvai ca te putrai mahānṛpendra tiṣṭhataḥ śokānalasaṃpradīptau /
XXbsu035_u:2279: ekastavo putravaro na dṛśyeta nṛpa grasto mahāsattva anityatayā //
XXbsu035_u:2282: teṣāṃ mahāsattva varakumāro mahānta kāruṇya balaṃ janetvā // Suv_19.59 //
XXbsu035_u:2283: bodhau ca kṛtvā praṇidhimudārāṃ sarvāṃśca sattvāniha bodhayiṣye /
XXbsu035_u:2284: taṃ bodhiṃ gambhīramudāramiṣṭvā anāgate 'dhvani ahaṃ spṛśeyam // Suv_19.60
XXbsu035_u:2285: patito mahāsattvo giri taṭatu so 'gre sthito vyāghryaḥ kṣudhābhibhūtāyāḥ /
XXbsu035_u:2286: muhūrta nirmāsakṛtaḥ sa aṅgaṃ ca asthāvaśeṣaṃ kṛtaḥ rājaputraḥ //
XXbsu035_u:2287: evaṃ ca śrutvā sa vacaḥ sudhāreṃ saṃmūrcchito rāja mahārathaśca /
XXbsu035_u:2288: patitaśca dharaṇīya vinaṣṭacittaḥ śokāgninā prajvalitaḥ sudāruṇā //
XXbsu035_u:2290: sarve sthitā ūrdhvabāhuśca sa kandamānāḥ tṛtīyo 'mātyo nṛpamabravīt //
XXbsu035_u:2291: dṛṣṭau mayādya ubhau kumārau samucchatau tatra mahāvane 'smin /
XXbsu035_u:2292: patitau dharaṇyāṃ ca vinaṣṭacittau asmābhirudakena ca siñcitāni //
XXbsu035_u:2293: yāvatsmṛtiṃ labhyate punaḥ sthitau hi ādīpta paśyanti diśaścatastraḥ /
XXbsu035_u:2294: muhūrta tiṣṭhanti patanti bhūmau kāruṇasvareṇa paridevayanti // Suv_19.65
XXbsu035_u:2296: tā ūrdhvabāhu satataṃ sthihanti varṇamudīrantayorbhrātarasya sa caiva rājā hṛdi dīnacittaḥ putraviyogātsuvikṣiptacittaḥ // Suv_19.66 //
XXbsu035_u:2297: śokapraviddhaḥ paridevayitvā evaṃ hi rājā paridevayanti /
XXbsu035_u:2298: ekaśca me putra priyamanāpaḥ grasta kaniṣṭho vanarākṣasena // Suv_19.67 //
XXbsu035_u:2299: mā me imau anya ca dvau hi putra śokāgninā jīvitasaṃkṣayaṃ vrajet /
XXbsu035_u:2300: yannūna haṃ śīghra vrajeya tatra paśyeya putrau priyadarśanau tau //
XXbsu035_u:2301: śīghreṇa yānena ca rājadhānīṃ praveśayedrājakulānta śīghram /
XXbsu035_u:2302: mā eṣā māturhi janetu kāmaṃ śokāgninā taddhṛdaya sphaṭe tat // Suv_19.69
XXbsu035_u:2303: putrau ca dṛṣṭvā labhate praśāntiṃ na jīvitenālabhate viyogam /
XXbsu035_u:2304: rājāpi cāmātyagaṇena sārdhaṃ dvipābhirūḍho gata tatra darśitu // Suv_19.70
XXbsu035_u:2305: dṛṣṭvā ca putrau bhrātṛnāmāhvānau karuṇāsvaraṃ krandatau āttamānā /
XXbsu035_u:2306: rājā hi tatputradvayaṃ gṛhītvā prarodamānopi puraṃ vrajitvā /
XXbsu035_u:2307: sā śīghraśīghraṃ tvaramāna svaputrāṃ devīṃ adarśetsutaputrakāmām //
XXbsu035_u:2309: ahaṃ ca sa śākyamunistathāgataḥ pūrvaṃ mahāsattvavaro babhūva //
XXbsu035_u:2310: putraśca rājño hi mahārathasya yenaiva vyāghrī sukhitā kṛtāsīt //
XXbsu035_u:2311: śuddhodano hi varapārthivendro mahāratho nāma babhūva rājā /
XXbsu035_u:2312: mahiṣī ca āsīdvaramāyadevī mahāpraṇādastatha maitriyo 'bhūt // Suv_19.73
XXbsu035_u:2314: vyāghrī abhūttatra mahāprajāpatī vyāghrīsutā pañcaka amī hi bhikṣavaḥ //
XXbsu035_u:2315: atha mahārā ā mahādevī va bahuvidhakaruṇāparidevanaṃ kṛtvā bharaṇānyevamucya mahato anakāyena sārdhaṃ putrasya śarīrapū āṃ kṛtvāsminpradeśe tasya mahāsattvasyeme śarīrā pratiṣṭhāpitā ayaṃ saptaratnayamastūpaḥ /
XXbsu035_u:2316: tatra devena mahāsattvenāsyai vyāghryā ātmabhāvaṃ parityaktam /
XXbsu035_u:2317: evaṃ rūpaṃ ca praṇidhānaṃ karuṇayā kṛtam /
XXbsu035_u:2318: imaṃ mayā śarīrasya parideśanā 'nāgate 'dhvani gaṇanāsamatikrāntaiḥ kalpaiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ buddhakāyaṃ ca kāritā /
XXbsu035_u:2319: asmindeśane nirdiśyamāna aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sadevamānuṣikāyāḥ pra āyāḥ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
XXbsu035_u:2322: sa ca stūpo buddhādhiṣṭhānena tatraivāntardhānamanuprāpta iti //
XXbsu035_u:2327: upasaṃkramya tasya suvarṇaratnākaracchatrakūṭasya tathāgarasya pādau śirasā banditvaikānte sthitāni kṛtāñ alibhūtāni taṃ suvarṇaratnākaracchatrakūṭaṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭavitsuḥ //
XXbsu035_u:2329: suvarṇavarṇo girivā munīndra suvarṇavarṇo munipuṇḍarīka // Suv_20.1 //
XXbsu035_u:2331: suvirā itaṃ kāñcanasuprabhāsaṃ sunirmalaṃ saumyamivācalendrama // Suv_20.2
XXbsu035_u:2334: sunirmalaṃ suvimalate asuprabhaṃ puṇyaṃ śatalakṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtaṃ inam /
XXbsu035_u:2342: yacca samupacitapuṇyasaṃcayaṃ tena sattvaḥ prāpnyatu bodhimuttamām //
XXbsu035_u:2343: atha khalu ruciraketubodhisattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ prāvaritvā dakṣiṃṇa ānu maṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñ aliṃ praṇamayitvā tasyāṃ velāyāmimābhirgāthābhiramyastāvīt sa tvaṃ munīndra śatapuṇyalakṣaṇa sahasraśrīcāruguṇairalaṃkṛtam /
XXbsu035_u:2350: apūrvavarṇo vira o virā ase yathaiva muktaṃ bhramarākulaprabham //
XXbsu035_u:2354: tvayā hi prahlādakarī sukhaṃkarī śubhākaraṃ sarvasukhākarāgamam /
XXbsu035_u:2356: virā ase tvaṃ dyumaṇīrivāṃśubhiḥ yatho valaṃ tvaṃ gagaṇe 'rkamaṇḍalam /
XXbsu035_u:2358: gokṣīraśaṅkhakumudendusaṃnibhaḥ tuṣārapadmābhasupāṇḍura prabhaḥ dantāvaliste mukhato virā ate sadrā ahaṃsairiva cāntarīkṣam // Suv_20.15
XXbsu035_u:2361: iti śrīsuvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarā e sarvatathāgatastavaparivarto nāma viṃśatitamaḥ //
XXbsu035_u:2364: atha khalu bodhisattvasaṃmuccayā nāma kuladevatā hṛṣṭatuṣṭā tasyaṃ velāyāmimābhirgāthābhirbhagavantaṃ tuṣṭāva //
XXbsu035_u:2367: aho aho buddhamanakṣate asaṃ aho aho sāgaramerutulyam /
XXbsu035_u:2368: aho aho buddhamanantagocaraṃ audumbaraṃ puṣpamivātidurlabham // Suv_21.2
XXbsu035_u:2370: yena dṛśaṃ bhāṣita sūtramuttamaṃ sarveṣu sattvāmanugrahārtham // Suv_21.3
XXbsu035_u:2372: gambhīraśāstā vira ā samādhiḥ yadanupraviṣṭo inabuddhagocare // Suv_21.4
XXbsu035_u:2374: te sarvadharmāḥ prakṛtyā ca śūnyāḥ sattvāpi śūnyātma na ātu vidyate //
XXbsu035_u:2376: nityaṃ ca nityaṃ ca ina smarāmi nityaṃ ca śocāmi inasya darśanam /
XXbsu035_u:2377: satataṃ ca nityaṃ praṇidhiṃ karomi saṃbuddha sūryasya ca darśanārtham //
XXbsu035_u:2378: sthāpyeha nityaṃ dharaṇīṣu ānu atiśokatapto 'smi inasya darśane /
XXbsu035_u:2379: rodimi kāruṇyavināyakatvaṃ abhisaṃtṛṣṇāsmi sugatasya darśane // Suv_21.7
XXbsu035_u:2380: śokāgninā pra valito 'smi samanta nityaṃ dadāhi me darśanatoya śītalam /
XXbsu035_u:2381: sattvāḥ satṛṣṇāstava rūpadarśane prahlādayenmāṃ karuṇodakena // Suv_21.8
XXbsu035_u:2382: kāruṇyabhāvaṃ kuru mahya nāyaka dadāhi me darśana saumyarūpaṃ /
XXbsu035_u:2383: tvayā hi trātā agadeva deśitaḥ śūnyāśca kāyastatha śrāvakāṇām // Suv_21.9
XXbsu035_u:2385: sarve ca sattvāḥ supina svabhāvā mahāntaśūnyāḥ svaya nāyakasya //
XXbsu035_u:2387: sādhu sādhu te kuladevate śāstā dadāti sādhu te kuladevate punaśca sādhviti //
XXbsu035_u:2389: idamavocadbhagavānāttamanāste bodhisattvā bodhisattvasamuccayākuladevatāsarasvatīmahādevīpramukhā sā ca sarvāvatī parṣatsadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragādipramukhā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti iti śrīsuvarṇaprabhāsottamasūtrendrarā e nigamanaparivarto nāmaikaviṃśatitamaḥ //
